63 #include "hw_conf.h"

65 
66 /* BACKUP_PRIMASK MUST be implemented at the begining of the funtion
67  that implement a critical section
68  PRIMASK is saved on STACK and recovered at the end of the funtion
69  That way RESTORE_PRIMASK ensures that no irq would be triggered in case of
70  unbalanced enable/disable, reentrant code etc...*/
71 #define BACKUP_PRIMASK() uint32_t primask_bit= __get_PRIMASK()
72 #define DISABLE_IRQ() __disable_irq()
73 #define ENABLE_IRQ() __enable_irq()
74 #define RESTORE_PRIMASK() __set_PRIMASK(primask_bit)
75 
76 /* prepocessor directive to align buffer*/
77 #define ALIGN(n) __attribute__((aligned(n)))
78 
79 typedef uint32_t TimerTime_t;
80 
88 #define MIN( a, b ) ( ( ( a ) < ( b ) ) ? ( a ) : ( b ) )
89 
97 #define MAX( a, b ) ( ( ( a ) > ( b ) ) ? ( a ) : ( b ) )
98 
105 #define POW2( n ) ( 1 << n )
106 
115 __STATIC_INLINE uint8_t __ffs( uint32_t value )
116 {
117  return( uint32_t )( 32 - __CLZ( value & ( -value ) ) );
118 }
